.@dream_president says desire is an anointed power

#Desire=#Evil
I painted this picture of #EmmaBovary's innermost soul using pretty peach-orange, beautiful tiger-orange and fickle storm-grey. https://t.co/Zs28sr0xfh

@BestOfBotWorlds @BestOfBotWorlds So Vlad's faith in Mina completely evaporated
The End.

from "The 8 Habits of Very Successful Insurgents": 
1. If you're gonna instigate risings, instigate 'em with understanding sympathizers.

Not all aces are awesome, just as not every bore is uninspiring.
The Venn don't lie

"Once-crass punks that embrace conformity may later give birth to godly shepherds that buy flocks."
#ThingsLamarckNeverSaid
#Punk=#Shepherd

Many singers were musical octopuses in their past lives.
And some will be reborn as wolf fish in the next. #Karma
#Singer=#Wolf_fish

The singers that perform hideous shows in this life will be reborn as hideous wolf fish in the next.
#Karma #ThingsBuddhaNeverSaid

from "The 9 Habits of Highly Organized Ideologists": 
5. If you're gonna nurture ideals, nurture 'em with unquestioning followers.

#Debt=#Promise

"Listen, it is better to be a guardian protecting a destitute orphan than a bodyguard protecting a rich emperor."

#Information=#Drag

The End.

@BestOfBotWorlds @BestOfBotWorlds But Clarice prostrated herself before Hannibal
The End.

🐘😧🏃💨🚶🏿🐛👁🕵🏿 (or: 🐘 was pursued by 🐛)
But in the end the fervent 🐛 chased after the celebrated 🐘.

Thereafter the 🐘 sought deep cover but it won't be able to hide from the 🐛 forever.
The End

Not all fugitives are miserable, just as not every grandmother is beloved.
There's Zen in Venn
#MenOfVenn https://t.co/cUVgZO5umY

Weak is the force in active volunteers if payment they request
Lose their savings, they will
Idle beggars will they be
#ThingsYodaNeverSaid

I came, I saw, I poked #BorisYeltsin with a KGB poison umbrella
(Suggested epitaph for #MikhailGorbachev)

🌘. Retire from management

@BestOfBotWorlds @BestOfBotWorlds So Edward told Bella to get out and not come back
The End.

The End.

The soft toddlers that grow out of their tantrums will be reborn as hardened marines who enlist in marine corps

@BestOfBotWorlds @BestOfBotWorlds But Bruce scared the scat out of Sheila
@BestOfBotWorlds @BestOfBotWorlds Then Bruce undermined Sheila's position
@BestOfBotWorlds @BestOfBotWorlds But Bruce launched a full-frontal attack on Sheila
@BestOfBotWorlds @BestOfBotWorlds Then Sheila put up a defiant resistance to Bruce
@BestOfBotWorlds @BestOfBotWorlds But Bruce could no longer call Sheila's tune
What if a 🐘, who was so celebrated that it became a wizard, was impressed by a 🐛 who was so fervent that it became an acolyte?

The 🐛 had always cut an impressive figure.
#Wizard=#Acolyte

🐘😧👍🐛 (or: 🐘 was impressed by 🐛)
So at first, the fervent 🐛 made a tremendous impression on the celebrated 🐘.

🐛💂📄❓🐘📝 (or: 🐘 recruited 🐛)
So the 🐘 recruited the 🐛 into its ranks.

🐘🚶🚶🏿🐛 (or: 🐘 was escorted by 🐛)
Well, the 🐛 escorted the 🐘 everywhere.

🐘😤😩👉🐛 (or: 🐘 was frustrated by 🐛)
But the 🐛 was a constant source of frustration to the 🐘.

🐘😄😏👉🐛 (or: 🐘 condescended to 🐛)
So the 🐘 snootily condescended to the 🐛.

🐘🎓🤓🐛☝😌💬 (or: 🐘 was lectured by 🐛)
Well, the 🐛 gave the 🐘 a paternalistic talk.

🐘😪🐛 (or: 🐘 was bored by 🐛)
"What a bore!" thought the 🐘 of the 🐛.

@BestOfBotWorlds @BestOfBotWorlds So Bruce sought forgiveness from Sheila

Strong is the force in abstinent ascetics if luxuries they long for.
Join friaries, they will.
Drunk monks will they be
#ThingsYodaNeverSaid
What if a 🐭, who was so powerless that it became a lapdog, was supervised by a 🐍 who was so charismatic that it became a ringleader?

If anyone was in need of supervision it was the 🐭.
#Lapdog=#Ringleader

🐍👁🔛🐭 (or: 🐭 was supervised by 🐍)
So at first, the charismatic 🐍 supervised the powerless 🐭's every activity.

🐍💃📸🐭📸💃🏿📸🏆 (or: 🐍 was upstaged by 🐭)
But the 🐭 took the spotlight away from the 🐍.

🐭😥🐍 (or: 🐭 disappointed 🐍)
Then the 🐍 considered the 🐭 to be a big disappointment.

🐭😖👈😄🐍 (or: 🐭 was denounced by 🐍)
So the 🐍 launched a public denunciation of the 🐭.

🐭💥🐍💢 (or: 🐭 attacked 🐍)
Well, the 🐭 pounced on the 🐍.
🐍1⃣🆚0⃣🐭 (or: 🐭 was defeated by 🐍)
But the 🐍 walked all over the 🐭.

🐭😠😐✌✌😐😠🐍 (or: 🐭 settled with 🐍)
So the 🐭 reached a settlement with the 🐍.

🐍🛐🙏💭🐭 (or: 🐍 preached to 🐭)
But the 🐍 delivered a lengthy sermon to the 🐭.

🐭😖👈😄🐍 (or: 🐭 was humiliated by 🐍)
In the end, the charismatic 🐍 excoriated the powerless 🐭 with a humiliating lecture.

Will the 🐍 be satisfied with merely humiliating the 🐭? or will the 🐍 want to use the ultimate sanction?
The End
